entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
